hasSgEntity.label: Does the company have a Singapore registered entity
hasSgEntity.helperText: As AYP Global Pay is based in Singapore, invoices generated to companies with a registered Singapore entity, are required by law, to include GST collected to Inland Revenue Authority of Singapore (IRAS)

sgEntityUen.helperText: Enter the UEN of the Singapore registered company

error.valueMustMeetRequiredLength: Value must be between 9 and 10 characters long.
